31#include <stdio.h>
32#include <string.h>
33#include "gmp.h"
34#include "gmp-impl.h"
35
36
37/* FIXME: Would like an mpz_set_mem (or similar) accepting a pointer and
38 length so we wouldn't have to copy the numerator just to null-terminate
39 it. */
40
41int
42mpq_set_str (mpq_ptr q, const char *str, int base)
43{
44 const char *slash;
45 char *num;
46 size_t numlen;
47 int ret;
48
49 slash = strchr (str, '/');
50 if (slash == NULL)
51 {
52 SIZ(DEN(q)) = 1;
53 PTR(DEN(q))[0] = 1;
54
55 return mpz_set_str (mpq_numref(q), str, base);
56 }
57
58 numlen = slash - str;
59 num = __GMP_ALLOCATE_FUNC_TYPE (numlen+1, char);
60 memcpy (num, str, numlen);
61 num[numlen] = '\0';
62 ret = mpz_set_str (mpq_numref(q), num, base);
63 (*__gmp_free_func) (num, numlen+1);
64
65 if (ret != 0)
66 return ret;
67
68 return mpz_set_str (mpq_denref(q), slash+1, base);
69}
70
